targets.query: SELECT mean("hub_rssi") FROM "weatherflow_device_status" WHERE ("serial_number" =~ /^$serial_number$/ AND "collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "serial_number"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "hub_sn"  WHERE "station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/
list.label: Hub
list.name: hub_sn
